name: bulletintest
description: Social GPS application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.predev: npm run clean:uploads && cd server && npm run seed
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "firebase emulators:start --import ./emulator-data"
scripts.server: cross-env PINPOINT_PERF_LOGS=silent npm --prefix server run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.server:firebase: cross-env PORT=8000 GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../.vscode/bulletin-app-6548a-firebase-adminsdk-fbsvc-33332cd77e.json" FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST= PINPOINT_RUNTIME_MODE=online npm --prefix server run dev
scripts.client:firebase: cross-env VITE_RUNTIME_MODE=online VITE_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8000 VITE_FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_URL= npm --prefix client run dev
